root.name: Gauntlet: The Third Encounter
root.description: In order to play this game the lynx needed to be held in the vertical position. If playing on the original lynx, this could become quite uncomfortable. The character choices in this game were quite unique in comparison to other versions with choices like an Android, a Valkyrie, a Gunfighter, a Nerd, a Pirate, a Punk Rocker, a Samurai and a Wizard!
